subject: Families and Family Life
Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: ENGLEWOOD, Colo., Aug. 30 (AP) — With No. 7 emblazoned across his chest, the high school senior preparing for the season opener Friday night drops back and throws a dart to a receiver in the back of the end zone.
